name: Industrial Ethanol Association
goal: meeting and discussion forum for industrial ethanol producers on the subject of European and world developments of a legislative and political nature relating to the production, sale, import-export, development and use of ethanol
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Business and Industry, Climate Action, Competition, Consumers, Customs, Energy, Environment, External Relations, Public Health, Single market, Taxation, Trade, Transport
euInitiatives: Trade, Environmental, Consumer health, tariff & customs, and biofuels interests mainly
